testcase.name: Verify Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on adactin page...............................................passed When User enters "nitish123" and "Q8PTF9" and Click on Login Button.........passed Then User verify login sucess message "Hello Nitish123!"....................passed

testcase.name: Verify Login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on adactin page...............................................passed When User enters "nitish123" and "hello@123" and Click on Login Button......passed Then User verify login error message "Invalid Login details or Your Password might have expired. ".passed

testcase.name: Verify login page using Enter key with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on adactin page...............................................passed When User enters userName and password and press enter key..................passed Then User verify login sucess message "Hello nitish123!"....................passed
